toast verb [T]
(HEAT)
to make bread or other food warm, crisp (= hard enough to break), and brown by putting it near a high heat: Do you want this bread toasted? The sandwich was served on lightly toasted ciabatta.
informal to warm yourself or part of your body: He's just toasting his feet by the fire.
